channel.title: [No Info] Feature wipe out bug
channel.description:
####What happened? Before Day8 everything from my chat box, role list to almost everything was wiped. http://imgur.com/a/0NrU5
####What was SUPPOSED to happen? **The working screen:** http://imgur.com/a/7GdmN
####Steps to reproduce: 1. Perhaps, i would need to give an output_log to Boslof. 2. Try to update again.
####Comments: Not sure what happened here but hopefully i can get some advice or assistance on how to fix it. It may very be my pc. The more players, the worse? Most of my games run at 2 -4 FPS, on a good day 6-8 FPs. But the game is playable. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

item.title: [No Info] Feature wipe out bug
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
If you encounter it again post the output_log.

item.title: [No Info] Feature wipe out bug
item.dc:creator: Rain
item.description:
####What happened?
Before Day8 everything from my chat box, role list to almost everything was wiped.
http://imgur.com/a/0NrU5

####What was SUPPOSED to happen?
The working screen:
http://imgur.com/a/7GdmN

####Steps to reproduce:

  1. Perhaps, i would need to give an output_log to Boslof.
  2. Try to update again.

####Comments:
Not sure what happened here but hopefully i can get some advice or assistance on how to fix it.
It may very be my pc. The more players, the worse?
Most of my games run at 2 -4 FPS, on a good day 6-8 FPs. But the game is playable. ¯_(ツ)_/¯

Read full topic
